intrebare?: If you paint a mural on a classroom wall as an assignment for your art class, who owns the copyright?
raspuns1: The school because it owns the wall.
raspuns2: You do because you are the "author" of the work.
raspuns3: Your parents because you are too young to own a copyright.
raspuns4: Your art teacher because she assigned the art project.
raspuns corect: You do because you are the "author" of the work.
